text: Hello Everyone, As we have recently published 20 free modules, i can see there is a limit of max 20 free modules can be published. But we have plans to publish 50+ free modules in HubSpot. We still have many modules ready and in pipeline. Is there anything we can do Please help.

Hello all! :speaker:FYI- There has been an update to the active install requirement for app certification. Effective *today*, *May 15, 2024*, the minimum number of active installs required for achieving app certification increased from *6 to 60*. This change is designed to enhance the quality and credibility of the apps available to our users. The change will apply to all new submissions moving forward, and existing certified apps that do not meet the new requirement of *60 active installs will be granted* *a one-year remediation period*. For more information please visit:
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/active-install-requirement-increase-for-app-certification|Developer Changelog>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Developer-Announcements/Active-Install-requirement-increase-for-App-Certification/m-p/976829#M719|Developer Announcements - Community Post>
If you have any questions or concerns please reach out to <mailto:appcertification@HubSpot.com|appcertification@HubSpot.com>, thank you! :orange_heart:
